Name: Complete Purchase Flow for Apple Accessories on Cellphone Staging
Description: Navigate through the accessories section, select an Apple product, and proceed through checkout by entering shipping information and verifying the home page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over link accessories
Step 3: Click on link apple2 -> Navigate to page '/category/chekhly-na-iphone'
Step 4: Click on link productAppleAdapter -> Navigate to page '/product/*'
Step 5: Click on button buy
Step 6: Click on link placeOrder -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 7: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page '/checkout/info'
Step 8: Click on input email
Step 9: Enter input value in input email
Step 10: Press key Tab on input email
Step 11: Click on button continueToShipping -> Navigate to page '/checkout/shipping-address'
Step 12: Click on input firstName
Step 13: Enter input value in input firstName
Step 14: Press key Tab on input firstName
Step 15: Enter input value in input lastName
Step 16: Press key Tab on input lastName
Step 17: Click on input address
Step 18: Enter input value in input address
Step 19: Press key Tab on input address
Step 20: Press key Tab on input zipCode
Step 21: Press key Tab on input city
Step 22: Click on input state
Step 23: Enter input value in input state
Step 24: Click on input phone -> Navigate to page ''
Step 25: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Complete Order for Samsung Phone with Custom Options
Description: Navigate to the home page, select a Samsung phone, customize options, and complete the order through checkout.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Hover over link phone
Step 3: Click on link samsung -> Navigate to page '/category/samsung'
Step 4: Click on button addToCart
Step 5: Click on label colorStorageOption (storage512Gb)
Step 6: Click on label colorStorageOption (colorWhite)
Step 7: Click on label colorStorageOption (colorBlack)
Step 8: Click on button buy
Step 9: Click on link placeOrder -> Navigate to page '/cart'
Step 10: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page '/checkout/payment'
Step 11: Click on button completeOrder -> Navigate to page '/thank-you/*'
Step 12: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Navigate to Apple iPhone 15 Case from Home Page
Description: Start at the home page, click on the main object, hover over the span, and select the Apple link. Navigate to the iPhone 15 case page and verify the home page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on main object
Step 3: Hover over span object
Step 4: Click on link apple
Step 5: Click on link apple -> Navigate to page '/category/phone-apple'
Step 6: Click on link iphone15Case -> Navigate to page ''
Step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
